original_text: And it came to pass, when Zimri saw that the city was taken, that he went into the palace of the king's house, and burnt the king's house over him with fire, and died.
korean_text: 시므리가 성읍이 함락됨을 보고 왕궁 요새에 들어가서 왕궁에 불을 지르고 그 가운데에서 죽었으니

sentences.original_text: when Zimri saw that the city was taken
sentences.korean_translation: 심리가 그 성이 점령당한 것을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: that he went into the palace of the king's house
and burnt the king's house over him with fire
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 불로 왕의 집을 자기 위에 태웠다
